00018 using std::vector;
00019 
00020 typedef vector<BDSSpline_tab_entry*> vTab;
00021 typedef vector<G4double> vDbl;
00022 
00023 class BDSSpline
00024 {
00025 public:

00030                   vDbl* yIn,G4int yscalIn);
00031   G4double integrate(G4double xIn);
